adHeader: Experienced Nanny ISO new family F.T. Mission, Noe, Bernal etc.
adDetails: Hi, my name is Lupe, and I am looking for a full time nanny position. I have nannied for many families in San Francisco over the years as well as raised 4 children of my own. I am bilingual (Spanish and English) and I am happy to speak either Spanish or English in the household with your child. I am very familiar with all of the local parks, daytime activities in SF, and how to get around walking or via public transportation. About Me: * I love children. I am very comfortable taking care of newborns, infants and toddlers. * The child always comes first - their happiness and well being is my primary focus! * I am trustworthy and reliable. I don't miss work - and I always communicate with parents. * I love to read and play! * I have years of experience. Both nannying in SF and raising my own. * I do light house cleaning, laundry and cooking for your child. * I have excellent references from previous families that I can provide. * I am looking for FT, M-F, 40-50hrs per week. I am looking for a wonderful family where I can help your child be happy and healthy, and help you, as parents, be comfortable at home and at work. Please call me if you would like to talk. Muchas Gracias, Lupe Vega
